documentation.xhtml: The program activates or deactivates the cooling compressor depending on the deviaton of the actual temperature from the septpoint temperature (with a hysteresis) TRUE or FALSE of the cooling compresseor is transfered to the signal processing.
The temperature is decreased on a time delay, when the comepressor has been activated
The temperature is increased on a time delay, when the compressor has been activated
Delay time when the door is closed
Delay time when the door is open
